mapper.update:
update KQDS_CHUFANG
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
costno = #{costno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recipecode = #{recipecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_CHUFANG set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, costno = #{costno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurse = #{nurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, techperson = #{techperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recipecode = #{recipecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) from KQDS_CHUFANG where 1=1 and status = 0 and costno =#{_parameter}

select TOP(1)
FROM KQDS_CHUFANG ORDER BY recipecode DESC
select c.recipecode, s.totalcost from KQDS_CHUFANG c LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER s ON c.costno=s.costno where 1=1 and c.costno=#{costno} and c.status = 0
